plugins.name: UIEditor-Exporter
plugins.description:
A utility plugin by Quicksave Interactive to make the workflow between Figma and the UI Editor a seamless experience.


This plugin allows you to export your Figma Designs to be used inside of the Quicksave UI Editor.


Be sure to read this to understand how to properly use this Exporter:


  1. Current supported UI Editor nodes are: Container, Text, Sprite.
  2. Figma's Fill and Strokes are converted to Sprite nodes (SVGs).
  3. Avoid having your UI bleeding outside their parent nodes.
  4. Keep a clear hierarchy and try to use descriptive and unique names for your nodes.
  5. You must save each image individually using the Exporter with the default name in the folder you specified. If you change these names / folders, you can update this in the UI Editor.
  6. If you encounter a missing feature, please email support for this plugin so we can look into it.
plugins.tagline: Exports Figma Designs to be used in Quicksave's UI Editor

122173.name: UIEditor-Exporter
122173.description:
A utility plugin by Quicksave Interactive to make the workflow between Figma and the UI Editor a seamless experience.


This plugin allows you to export your Figma Designs to be used inside of the Quicksave UI Editor.


Be sure to read this to understand how to properly use this Exporter:


  1. Current supported UI Editor nodes are: Container, Text, Sprite.
  2. Figma's Fill and Strokes are converted to Sprite nodes (SVGs).
  3. Avoid having your UI bleeding outside their parent nodes.
  4. Keep a clear hierarchy and try to use descriptive and unique names for your nodes.
  5. You must save each image individually using the Exporter with the default name in the folder you specified. If you change these names / folders, you can update this in the UI Editor.
  6. If you encounter a missing feature, please email support for this plugin so we can look into it.
122173.release_notes:
* UI Editor parentSize values will not exceed three decimal places after the export. 
* Text Node Horizontal Alignment and Vertical Alignment has been improved. A new container Node will be created per Text Node to ensure consistent Position and Alignment.
122173.tagline: Exports Figma Designs to be used in Quicksave's UI Editor

plugins.name: Recount
plugins.description:
Recount replaces text layers with a counter, starting from any number, based on the XY position of each selected layer.


How to use:

  1. select the layers to be counted
  2. run Recount
  3. enter a number to start from (or hit ENTER to choose 1)
  4. choose a direction to count along (or hit ENTER to use LTR)


Left-to-right and right-to-left directions are available.
plugins.tagline: Easily count layers by their position

117829.name: Recount
117829.description:
Recount replaces text layers with a counter, starting from any number, based on the XY position of each selected layer.


How to use:

  1. select the layers to be counted
  2. run Recount
  3. enter a number to start from (or hit ENTER to choose 1)
  4. choose a direction to count along (or hit ENTER to use LTR)


Left-to-right and right-to-left directions are available.
117829.tagline: Easily count layers by their position

plugins.name: eStatemnt SD Module Import
plugins.description:
The eStatement SD Import Plugin for Figma streamlines the generation of Scholastic’s eStatement modules directly into the design workspace by pulling data from Airtable. This plugin allows team members to easily access and import up-to-date module content, simplifying design workflows and ensuring consistency across materials.


Please use the sandbox file linked to test and utilize this plugin effectively.

plugins.name: AVA Companion Plugin
plugins.description:
The AvaHub Batch Crop Importer plugin simplifies the design workflow by seamlessly importing crops generated by AvaHub.ai directly into Figma. AvaHub generates precise image crops, and this plugin allows you to batch import them effortlessly into your Figma workspace.


Simply upload the JSON file generated by AvaHub, and this plugin will take care of the rest, preparing all your crops for use in your Figma designs. Ideal for designers who work with dynamic content or need to quickly integrate various image assets.
plugins.tagline: A tool to batch crop your ava images

115757.name: AVA Companion Plugin
115757.description:
The AvaHub Batch Crop Importer plugin simplifies the design workflow by seamlessly importing crops generated by AvaHub.ai directly into Figma. AvaHub generates precise image crops, and this plugin allows you to batch import them effortlessly into your Figma workspace.


Simply upload the JSON file generated by AvaHub, and this plugin will take care of the rest, preparing all your crops for use in your Figma designs. Ideal for designers who work with dynamic content or need to quickly integrate various image assets.
115757.tagline: A tool to batch crop your ava images

plugins.name: Figmentation
plugins.description:
🪄 Figmentation – where Figma meets Autodocumentation


Tired of manual documentation?

Figmentation automates the process of extracting design tokens directly from your Figma components — including colors, typography, spacing, borders, and effects.

With just one click, Figmentation creates a clean, organized annotation frame beside your component — making handoff easier for developers and keeping your design system crystal clear.


Built by a designer who needed this — and figured others might too.


💡 What it does:

Extracts bound design tokens from your components

Supports multiple naming conventions (camelCase, kebab-case, etc.)

Automatically detects and documents:

Backgrounds, text colors, border colors

Font sizes, families, weights, line heights, letter spacing

Padding, gap, corner radius, stroke weight

Shadows and blurs

Generates readable and structured annotation layers

Keeps token names consistent with your system — or generates smart fallback names


🔧 Use cases:

Design system maintenance

Dev handoff

Figma token organization

Fast, scalable documentation for UI libraries


✨ Made for:

Product designers

Design system leads

Developers using Figma tokens

Anyone who hates repetitive documentation


🎯 Figmentation – where Figma meets Autodocumentation.

Crafted with care by someone who gets it.
plugins.tagline: Where Figma meets Auto-documentation

plugins.name: Design System AI
plugins.description:
Design System AI는 디자인 시스템의 구조와 자동화 수준을 진단하고 시각화하는 Figma 플러그인입니다.


🎯 주요 기능

  1. 디자인 토큰, 컴포넌트, 자동화 상태 대시보드
  2. 중복 토큰 및 네이밍 불일치 탐지
  3. 토큰·컴포넌트 사용량 시각화
  4. 디자인 자동화율 측정


🛠️ 사용 방법

1️⃣ Select a Frame

🔲 프레임 하나를 선택하세요 (디자인 시스템이 적용된 화면 또는 컴포넌트 포함 프레임)

2️⃣ Run the Plugin

🚀 플러그인을 실행하면 자동으로 분석이 시작돼요

3️⃣ Check the Dashboard

📊 토큰 수, 컴포넌트 수, 자동화율, 사용률 차트를 확인하세요

4️⃣ Export CSV

📥 “Export CSV” 버튼을 눌러 토큰 리포트를 다운로드할 수 있어요


🗣️ 피드백 및 소통방법

카카오톡 오픈채팅방 입장하기 (가벼운 질문, 빠른 소통, 사용 팁 공유)

디스코드 서버 (심층적인 피드백, 기술 논의, 버그 리포트)


여러분의 많은 관심과 참여 부탁드립니다!



Design System AI is a Figma plugin that diagnoses and visualizes the structure and automation level of your design system.


🎯 Key Features

  1. Design Token, Component, and Automation Status Dashboard
  2. Duplicate Token & Naming Inconsistency Detection
  3. Token & Component Usage Visualization
  4. Design Automation Rate Measurement


🛠️ How to Use

1️⃣ Select a Frame

🔲 Choose a frame (a screen where your design system is applied, or a frame containing components)

2️⃣ Run the Plugin

🚀 The analysis starts automatically when you run the plugin!

3️⃣ Check the Dashboard

📊 View your token count, component count, automation rate, and usage charts.

4️⃣ Export CSV

📥 Click the "Export CSV" button to download your token report.


🗣️ Feedback & Communication

KakaoTalk Open Chat Room: (For light questions, quick communication, and usage tips)

Discord Server: (For in-depth feedback, technical discussions, and bug reports)


We appreciate your interest and participation!
plugins.tagline: 디자인 토큰부터 컴포넌트까지, 한눈에 진단

plugins.name: Bulk Text Replacer
plugins.description:
CSV形式のファイルを読み込んで一括置換できます。

1列目に検索対象、2列目に置換内容を記述したCSVファイルを読み込ませて使用して下さい。


手入力で「検索する言葉」と「置換する言葉」の間に「=>」を入れることでも可能です。

例：検索する言葉 => 置換する言葉


You can perform bulk text replacement by importing a CSV file.

The first column should contain the text to search for, and the second column should contain the replacement text.


Alternatively, you can manually enter replacement pairs using the => format.

Example: original text => replacement text
plugins.tagline: Bulk text replacement for Figma, Figjam & Slides.

137797.description:

You can perform bulk text replacement by importing a CSV file.

Design smarter with Fake Products Library, the ultimate Figma plugin packed with hundreds of realistic fake product cards – complete with 📦 title, 📝 description, 💲 price, 🖼️ CTOCL image, and 🗂️ category.

🔧 Made for Designers. Built for Speed.

Try Fake Products Library today and bring your ideas to life – faster, cleaner, and better!

plugins.name: UX Buddy
plugins.description:
Transform your design process with instant, expert-level UX feedback.


UX Buddy is your personal design critic that never sleeps. This powerful Figma plugin analyzes your frames and provides instant, actionable feedback based on proven UX principles and industry best practices.


What UX Buddy Does:

✨ **Instant UX Analysis** - Get comprehensive design feedback in seconds, not hours

🎯 **Actionable Insights** - Receive specific, implementable recommendations to improve your designs

🎨 **Visual Design Review** - Analyze color usage, typography, spacing, and visual hierarchy

📱 **Accessibility Checks** - Ensure your designs meet accessibility standards and guidelines

🚀 **Workflow Integration** - Seamlessly integrates into your existing Figma workflow


Key Features:

- **Smart Color Analysis** - Detect contrast issues and color harmony problems

- **Typography Review** - Identify font pairing, hierarchy, and readability issues

- **Layout Evaluation** - Analyze spacing, alignment, and visual balance

- **UX Best Practices** - Get feedback based on established design principles

- **Detailed Reports** - Receive comprehensive analysis with prioritized recommendations

- **Real-time Feedback** - Instant analysis as you design


Perfect For:

- **Product Designers** looking to validate their design decisions

- **UX/UI Designers** wanting to ensure best practices

- **Design Teams** seeking consistent quality standards

- **Freelancers** who need expert-level feedback

- **Students** learning design principles


How It Works:

1. Select any frame in your Figma file

2. Click the UX Buddy plugin

3. Get instant, expert-level analysis

4. Implement suggested improvements

5. Create better user experiences


**Professional-grade analysis** - Providing comprehensive design critique and UX insights based on industry standards and proven methodologies.


Stop guessing about your design decisions. Let UX Buddy guide you toward creating exceptional user experiences that delight and convert.

accepted.name: Opeyemi Ajagbe
accepted.description: I craft digital products that empower people and drive business growth.

plugins.tagline: Expert UX analysis that makes your designs better, instantly.

plugins.name: CopySpark - AI Copywriter
plugins.description:
CopySpark – is an AI-powered Figma plugin built for designers. Powered by ChatGPT and Gemini, it helps you write clear, effective UX copy without leaving your canvas.


✨ Easily write new content from scratch.

🔁 Instantly generate alternative versions.

⚡ Work faster with AI instructions tailored to your tone and context.


Say goodbye to blank text boxes — let AI help you craft and iterate copy in seconds!


How to Use

  1. Choose your AI model – ChatGPT or Gemini.
  2. Enter your API key for the selected model.
  3. Select a text layer in your Figma file.
  4. Choose whether to generate alternatives for the selected text or write new copy from a prompt.
  5. Click “Go” to generate options, then click the version you like to insert it into your text layer.


Get Gemini API Key

Get ChatGPT API Key
plugins.tagline: AI copywriting powered by ChatGPT & Gemini! Write and iterate with ease!

  2. Connect with Figma to easily automate your creative work.
  3. Browse, select, and launch the app you want — it's easy to create your own.

plugins.name: ぼかし背景ジェネレーター
plugins.description:
# Image Aspect Ratio & Background Blur Generator Plugin


## Overview


This Figma plugin automatically generates a new frame from selected images (or rectangles with image fills),

with a **specified aspect ratio and width, and a blurred background**.


- Useful for creating SNS thumbnails and other aspect-ratio-fixed images

- Supports batch processing of multiple images at once


---


## Main Features


- **Aspect Ratio & Width Customization**

Choose from custom ratios or presets (16:9, 4:3, 1:1, etc.). You can freely specify the width (px).


- **Background Blur Effect**

The original image is enlarged and blurred as the background, with the original image centered. Blur strength and scale are adjustable.


- **Batch Processing**

Select multiple images or rectangles with image fills and generate all at once.


- **Automatic Saving & Restoration of Settings**

Your last-used settings are saved in Figma's clientStorage and automatically restored on next launch.


- **Japanese UI**

Intuitive and easy-to-use Japanese interface.


---


## How to Use


1. **Select images or rectangles with image fills**

Multiple selection is supported.


2. **Launch the plugin**

Set the aspect ratio, width, blur strength, and scale in the UI.


3. **Click the "Create" button**

A new frame with the specified ratio, width, and blurred background will be generated to the right of the selected image(s).


4. **Notification**

Success and error messages are shown at the bottom of the UI with color distinction.


---


## Notes


- Non-image nodes are automatically skipped.

- Settings are saved per Figma file.


---


## Data Security


- This plugin does **not** send any user data, images, or personal information to external servers.

- All settings are stored locally using Figma's `clientStorage` API.

- No external API or server communication is performed.


---


# 背景ブラー＆アスペクト比固定の画像生成プラグイン


## 概要


この Figma プラグインは、選択した画像（または画像 fill を持つ矩形）から、

**指定したアスペクト比・幅で新しいフレームを作成し、背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成**します。


- SNS 用サムネイルやサムネイル画像の自動生成に便利です

- 複数画像を一括で処理できます


---


## 主な機能


- **アスペクト比・幅の指定**

カスタム比率やプリセット（16:9, 4:3, 1:1 など）から選択可能。幅（px）も自由に指定できます。


- **背景ブラー効果**

元画像を拡大・ぼかして背景にし、中央に元画像を配置します。ブラー強度や拡大率も調整可能。


- **複数画像の一括処理**

複数の画像や画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択して一括で生成できます。


- **前回の設定値を自動保存・復元**

設定値は Figma の clientStorage に保存され、次回起動時に自動で復元されます。


- **日本語 UI**

直感的で使いやすい日本語インターフェース。


---


## 使い方


1. **画像または画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択**

複数選択も可能です。


2. **プラグインを起動**

UI でアスペクト比・幅・ブラー強度・拡大率を設定します。


3. **「作成」ボタンをクリック**

選択画像の右隣に、指定した比率・幅・ブラー背景付きの新しいフレームが自動生成されます。


4. **通知**

成功・エラーは画面下部に色分けして表示されます。


---


## 注意点


- 画像以外のノードは自動的にスキップされます。

- 設定値は Figma ファイルごとに保存されます。


---


## データセキュリティ


- 本プラグインはユーザーのデータや画像、個人情報を外部サーバーに一切送信しません。

- 設定値はFigmaの`clientStorage`機能を用いてローカル環境のみに保存されます。

- 外部APIや外部サーバーとの通信は一切行いません。
plugins.tagline: 選択した画像から、指定したアスペクト比・幅で背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成します。

plugins.name: Blueprint
plugins.description:
Blueprint is a UX documentation tool that helps create UX flows & development instructions lightning fast. Just import your Figma designs to Blueprint and create UX flows on its grid-based canvas.

Visit blueprintapp.design to learn more about Blueprint!


Key features:

  1. Import Figma design: Import selected frames or the entire page.
  2. Grid canvas: Arrange and organize Figma frames super fast.
  3. UX flowchart: Draw UX flows with arrows and diagrams using Figma designs, making it easier to communicate with your teammates.
  4. Add annotations: Write down instructions or detailed guidance about a selected scene for clearer communications.


To get started:

  1. Install the Plugin from the Figma Community
  2. Enter your Figma File URL
  3. Choose specific Frames or import all Frames to Blueprint
  4. Click the "Open on Blueprint" button to begin designing your UX flows
plugins.tagline: High-fidelity UX Flows Made Effortless

132111.name: Blueprint

  2. Grid canvas: Arrange and organize Figma frames super fast.
  3. UX flowchart: Draw UX flows with arrows and diagrams using Figma designs, making it easier to communicate with your teammates.
  4. Add annotations: Write down instructions or detailed guidance about a selected scene for clearer communications.


To get started:

  1. Install the Plugin from the Figma Community
  2. Enter your Figma File URL
  3. Choose specific Frames or import all Frames to Blueprint
  4. Click the "Open on Blueprint" button to begin designing your UX flows

plugins.name: SheetSync For DeSo
plugins.description:
SheetSync For DeSo: Spreadsheets to Figma Design Variations


Tired of manual data entry in Figma? SheetSync For DeSo revolutionizes your workflow by letting you populate design frames directly from your data sources.

Effortlessly generate multiple design variations, product cards, user profiles, and more by connecting to:

  1. Google Sheets (Public Links)
  2. Local CSV/XLSX Files

Rename your Figma text and image layers to match your spreadsheet headers (e.g., #product_name, #image_url), select your template frame, and let SheetSync do the rest! It even includes robust image fetching with retry options.
plugins.tagline: Design at Scale, Sheet to Shape

138524.name: SheetSync For DeSo
138524.description:
SheetSync For DeSo: Spreadsheets to Figma Design Variations


Tired of manual data entry in Figma? SheetSync For DeSo revolutionizes your workflow by letting you populate design frames directly from your data sources.

Effortlessly generate multiple design variations, product cards, user profiles, and more by connecting to:

  1. Google Sheets (Public Links)
  2. Local CSV/XLSX Files

Rename your Figma text and image layers to match your spreadsheet headers (e.g., #product_name, #image_url), select your template frame, and let SheetSync do the rest! It even includes robust image fetching with retry options.
138524.tagline: Design at Scale, Sheet to Shape

plugins.name: Add Section
plugins.description:
Add a section around your selected elements with a padding

  1. Select elements (frames, rectangles, even other sections)
  2. Set your desired padding (horizontal, vertical)
  3. Click Add section to put a new section around your selected elements


Resize existing sections to have the correct padding

  1. Select one or more sections
  2. Set your desired padding (horizontal, vertical)
  3. Click Resize Sections to adjust all selected sections
plugins.tagline: Add a section around your selected elements with a padding

131159.name: Add Section
131159.description:
Add a section around your selected elements with a padding

  1. Select elements (frames, rectangles, even other sections)
  2. Set your desired padding (horizontal, vertical)
  3. Click Add section to put a new section around your selected elements


Resize existing sections to have the correct padding

  1. Select one or more sections
  2. Set your desired padding (horizontal, vertical)
  3. Click Resize Sections to adjust all selected sections

- Added a way to fix the padding on existing sections (Resize Sections button)
- Fixed a bug where the plugin closed after each use
- Improved performance
131159.tagline: Add a section around your selected elements with a padding

plugins.name: 앱스토어 리뷰 추출기 (Appstpre Review Extractor)
plugins.description:
🧩 애플 앱스토어 리뷰를 Figma 프레임에 손쉽게 가져와 정리하세요

Easily import and organize Apple App Store reviews into your Figma frames


이 플러그인은 Apple App Store의 앱 리뷰를 가져와 평점별로 정리해줍니다.

사용자 피드백 분석, 제품 개선 준비, 인사이트 시각화 등 다양한 상황에서

실사용자 의견을 Figma 안에서 빠르고 효율적으로 표현할 수 있습니다.

→ This plugin fetches app reviews from the Apple App Store and organizes them by rating.

It's perfect for analyzing user feedback, planning improvements, and visualizing insights—all within Figma.


🔍 주요 기능 | Key Features

최근 평점별(5★, 4★ 등) 리뷰 가져오기 가능

→ Import recent reviews by rating (e.g., 5★, 4★)


현재 운영 중인 앱의 현황 확인, 고객의 pain point 확인

→ Check the current status of your app and identify user pain points


UX 리서치, 앱 디자인, 제품 문서화에 활용 가능

→ Use in UX research, app design, and product documentation


🛠 사용순서 | How to Use

1) 플러그인을 실행하세요

→ Launch the plugin


2) 사용하고자 하는 앱스토어 ID를 확인합니다

→ Find the App Store ID of your target app

(https://www.apple.com/kr/app-store/에서 앱 검색 후 주소창에 id숫자 확인/복사)

→ (Search the app on the App Store and copy the numeric id from the URL)


3) 해당 ID를 플러그인 입력창에 붙여넣습니다

→ Paste the ID into the plugin input field


4) 원하는 평점(예: 5★) 을 선택합니다

→ Select the desired rating (e.g., 5★)


5) "리뷰 불러오기" 버튼을 클릭합니다

→ Click the "Import Reviews" button

accepted.name: kenny
accepted.description: I am a designer who creates the tools and experiences that users truly need. I believe good design goes beyond visuals, flow and development.

plugins.tagline: App Store 리뷰를 한눈에, 피그마로 정리하자 (in Figma, Check your app review)

→ Launch the plugin


2) 사용하고자 하는 앱스토어 ID를 확인합니다

→ Find the App Store ID of your target app

(https://www.apple.com/kr/app-store/에서 앱 검색 후 주소창에 id숫자 확인/복사)

5) "리뷰 불러오기" 버튼을 클릭합니다

→ Click the "Import Reviews" button

plugins.name: Section Logger
plugins.description: ¡No pierdas ni un cambio! Con Section Logger, cada modificación en tus secciones de Figma queda registrada automáticamente. Visualiza los cambios en tiempo real, guarda un historial detallado de tus ediciones y personaliza el diseño con colores que se ajustan a tu estilo. Ideal para equipos que buscan organización, colaboración y eficiencia. ¡Mejora tu flujo de trabajo ahora!
plugins.tagline: Transforma tu flujo de trabajo: registra, organiza y visualiza cambios de diseño veloz.

129666.name: Section Logger
129666.description: ¡No pierdas ni un cambio! Con Section Logger, cada modificación en tus secciones de Figma queda registrada automáticamente. Visualiza los cambios en tiempo real, guarda un historial detallado de tus ediciones y personaliza el diseño con colores que se ajustan a tu estilo. Ideal para equipos que buscan organización, colaboración y eficiencia. ¡Mejora tu flujo de trabajo ahora!
129666.release_notes:
Release Note: Versión 1.1

Nuevas funcionalidades:
1.Soporte de idioma (Español/Inglés):
•Se ha implementado un selector de idioma en la UI del plugin, que permite cambiar entre español e inglés con un switch/slider intuitivo.
•El idioma de la interfaz (títulos, botones y textos) cambia dinámicamente según la selección del usuario.
•El texto de los logs registrados también cambia de idioma, mostrando la información correctamente tanto en español como en inglés, dependiendo del idioma seleccionado.
2.Actualización de sticker:
•Mejora de la gestión de stickers: Ahora, si un sticker ya existe, se actualiza con los nuevos logs en lugar de crear uno nuevo cada vez que se registra una edición.
•Si el sticker ya está presente, su contenido se limpia y se reemplaza con los nuevos logs, garantizando que no haya stickers duplicados.

Mejoras adicionales:
•Se mejoró el posicionamiento dinámico del sticker, asegurando que se mantenga correctamente ubicado en la esquina superior izquierda de la sección.
•Se optimizó el código para hacer el plugin más eficiente y evitar la creación de stickers innecesarios.

Fixes:
•Se solucionó un problema en el que un nuevo sticker se creaba cada vez que se registraba un log, incluso si ya existía uno previamente.
129666.tagline: Transforma tu flujo de trabajo: registra, organiza y visualiza cambios de diseño veloz.

plugins.name: ColourSwatch
plugins.description:
Enhance your Figma workflow with the ColourSwatch plugin


Streamline the creation, management, and updating of colour swatches using local or published Figma colour variables. This plugin provides a clear visual overview of all the colours in your project, ensuring consistency and efficiency.


With this plugin, you can easily create a ColourSwatch component. For each colour variable —whether from a local collection or a linked, published Figma library — you can generate a component instance. Use the plugin to effortlessly update values such as hex codes, alpha values, and colour variable names — one by one or as a batch for all colour swatches on the same page.
plugins.tagline: Create maintain and update colour swatches based on your Figma colour variables.

127153.name: ColourSwatch
127153.description:
Enhance your Figma workflow with the ColourSwatch plugin


Streamline the creation, management, and updating of colour swatches using local or published Figma colour variables. This plugin provides a clear visual overview of all the colours in your project, ensuring consistency and efficiency.


With this plugin, you can easily create a ColourSwatch component. For each colour variable —whether from a local collection or a linked, published Figma library — you can generate a component instance. Use the plugin to effortlessly update values such as hex codes, alpha values, and colour variable names — one by one or as a batch for all colour swatches on the same page.

networkAccess.reasoning: No network access needed for the plugin.

127153.tagline: Create maintain and update colour swatches based on your Figma colour variables.

plugins.name: Renamer
plugins.description:
Renamer — Smarter Layer Naming


A Figma plugin that keeps your layers organized by automatically generating clear, descriptive names based on their properties. Perfect for maintaining a consistent and readable file structure in complex designs.


Just select your layers and run the plugin — names will be updated instantly based on your settings.


Layer properties included:

  1. Dimensions (width × height)
  2. Fill color (HEX code)
  3. Opacity values
  4. Effects (shadows, blurs)
  5. Constraints
  6. Corner radius
  7. Stroke details
  8. Auto Layout settings

accepted.name: Pavel Grachev
accepted.description: Product designer. Focused on clarity, usability, and quality design systems.

plugins.tagline: Automatically rename layers based on design properties

137579.name: Renamer
137579.description:
Renamer — Smarter Layer Naming


A Figma plugin that keeps your layers organized by automatically generating clear, descriptive names based on their properties. Perfect for maintaining a consistent and readable file structure in complex designs.


Just select your layers and run the plugin — names will be updated instantly based on your settings.


Layer properties included:

  1. Dimensions (width × height)
  2. Fill color (HEX code)
  3. Opacity values
  4. Effects (shadows, blurs)
  5. Constraints
  6. Corner radius
  7. Stroke details
  8. Auto Layout settings
137579.tagline: Automatically rename layers based on design properties

plugins.name: SuperVariables1
plugins.description:

plugins.name: QD - Revix - AI Feedback
plugins.description:
Get AI-Powered UI/UX Feedback Instantly! 🚀


Struggling to spot design issues? Let AI do the work! This powerful plugin analyzes your designs, provides insightful UI/UX feedback, and instantly adds comments, helping you refine your work faster and smarter.


✨ How it works:

✅ Select a design frame and start the analysis.

✅ Get multiple AI-generated feedback suggestions.

✅ Instantly add feedback as comments on your design.


Save time, improve usability, and design with confidence. all with the power of AI! 🦾🤖
plugins.tagline: AI feedback and comments on designs

plugins.name: Gename Thai
plugins.description:
Generate Random Thai Names Plugin


Quickly generate random Thai names for your designs! This plugin allows you to select one or multiple text fields and generate random names for males or females, with the option to include or exclude surnames.


❖ Generate Unique Names: Ensure each selected text field gets a distinct, random name.

❖ Customizable Gender Selection: Choose from male or female names based on your project needs.

❖ Surname Option: Add Thai surnames for a complete name experience.

❖ Easy Integration: Select your text fields, click "Generate", and watch your text change instantly!


---


สร้างชื่อไทยแบบสุ่มได้อย่างรวดเร็วสำหรับการออกแบบของคุณ! ปลั๊กอินนี้ช่วยให้คุณเลือกข้อความหนึ่งหรือหลายช่อง เพื่อสร้างชื่อสุ่มสำหรับผู้ชายหรือผู้หญิง โดยเลือกได้ว่าจะมีนามสกุลหรือไม่มี


❖ สร้างชื่อที่ไม่ซ้ำกัน: ให้ชื่อที่สุ่มออกมาไม่ซ้ำกันในแต่ละช่องข้อความที่เลือก

❖ เลือกเพศได้ตามต้องการ: สามารถเลือกชื่อสำหรับผู้ชายหรือผู้หญิงได้ตามความต้องการ

❖ ตัวเลือกนามสกุล: สามารถเพิ่มนามสกุลไทยให้กับชื่อได้

❖ การใช้งานง่าย: เลือกช่องข้อความ กด "Generate" แล้วชื่อจะถูกเปลี่ยนทันที

plugins.name: QD - Magix - AI UX Writer - Text Generator
plugins.description:
Magix - AI Text Generator enables seamless text creation for your designs using OpenAI’s API.


After connecting the API, simply select the text elements (Text objects, Sticky notes or Shapes with text) you wish to generate. The plugin will automatically list them, allowing you to input custom prompts. With a single click on ‘Generate Content’ all selected text elements will be instantly generated and integrated into your design, streamlining your workflow.


AI Makes It Simple...
plugins.tagline: AI-Powered Text Generation - All Texts with One Click

122756.name: QD - Magix - AI UX Writer - Text Generator
122756.description:
Magix - AI Text Generator enables seamless text creation for your designs using OpenAI’s API.


After connecting the API, simply select the text elements (Text objects, Sticky notes or Shapes with text) you wish to generate. The plugin will automatically list them, allowing you to input custom prompts. With a single click on ‘Generate Content’ all selected text elements will be instantly generated and integrated into your design, streamlining your workflow.


AI Makes It Simple...

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin requires access to the OpenAI API to generate text. and moeinsaboohi to load header image.

122756.release_notes:
I’m constantly working to improve Magix for a better experience. If you have any suggestions or encounter any issues, feel free to share them! 😊

Version 3 Release Notes:
•  Improved UI and UX for a smoother experience
•  Fixed plugin issues in FigJam
•  Added text generation support for sticky notes and text-based shapes
•  Enhanced state message display
•  Resolved reported bugs
122756.tagline: AI-Powered Text Generation - All Texts with One Click

plugins.name: DevPlugin - Copy Disign
plugins.description:
DevPlugin is a plugin for fast migration of components.


DevPlugin automates the process of obtaining and implementing components into web projects. The plugin creates secure scripts based on the layout and allows you to use them on any external resources.


What he can do:

  1. Generating a custom JS script
  2. Personal account with subscription management and action history
  3. Data encryption and protection of user tokens


Fits:

  1. UI/UX designer
  2. Developers of landing pages and interfaces
  3. To the authors of design systems
plugins.tagline: We will help you transfer your design to the constructor with all the adaptive designs.

plugins.name: List Replace
plugins.description: Replace lists in your design with content that matters to your product. All you do is select the text fields, paste in the last you would like (and you can save lists too) and press replace. You can also sort the lists to an order that makes sense.

accepted.name: Anna Everhart
accepted.description:
Just a product designer having a blast designing!

Check out my bento for all my socials!

plugins.tagline: Replace content with data that makes sense to your product

118571.name: List Replace
118571.description: Replace lists in your design with content that matters to your product. All you do is select the text fields, paste in the last you would like (and you can save lists too) and press replace. You can also sort the lists to an order that makes sense.

plugins.name: Feed Names, Get Frames (16:9, 1280x720)
plugins.description:
This plugin allows to batch-create 1280*720px (16:9) frames with user-defined names.


The frames will be created in the centre of the viewport, unless something is in the way — in this case it will place them to the bottom right of the conflicting element, and the frames created will remain selected for further batch manipulation. Frame size works well for YouTube thumbnails.


Useful for established design workflows, especially centred around YouTube design, with high volumes and short turnaround times.


Assuming that 1 manual frame creation+naming takes 5 seconds, then for 10 frames the plugin increases the efficiency by x50. And even more for a larger number of frames.

accepted.name: Alexandra (Sasha) Hunter
accepted.description: I do graphic and product design.

plugins.tagline: Paste a list of titles — get frames with those titles

125014.name: Feed Names, Get Frames (16:9, 1280x720)
125014.description:
This plugin allows to batch-create 1280*720px (16:9) frames with user-defined names.


The frames will be created in the centre of the viewport, unless something is in the way — in this case it will place them to the bottom right of the conflicting element, and the frames created will remain selected for further batch manipulation. Frame size works well for YouTube thumbnails.


Useful for established design workflows, especially centred around YouTube design, with high volumes and short turnaround times.


Assuming that 1 manual frame creation+naming takes 5 seconds, then for 10 frames the plugin increases the efficiency by x50. And even more for a larger number of frames.
125014.tagline: Paste a list of titles — get frames with those titles

plugins.name: Remove and select next
plugins.description:
😟 FIGMA NATIVE BEHAVIOR

-> Removing a layer triggers a global deselect.

Consequently, you need to take your mouse to select the next layer you want to work on.


🥳 PLUGIN BEHAVIOR

-> Removing a layer select the next layer.

Meaning you don't need to take your mouse back and you can continue to design at the speed of light on your keyboard!


⌨️ KEYBOARD SHORTCUT

Plugins can't have keyboard shortcuts so you'll have to set it on your own.

See this page for a tutorial on macOS native keyboard shortcuts and BetterTouchTools
plugins.tagline: Remove layers without leaving your keyboard

plugins.name: Generic Tailwind Generator
plugins.description:
Lasy to write font-size, font-weight, background-color, border-radius and all other generic props in every project ? Me too.


Just run npx generic-css-cli in your local project and run plugin to generate theses classes and focus yourself to what is really important.


The tool is not there to replace you but help you ❤️

plugins.name: BrandLife
plugins.description: Seamlessly integrate your design workflow with BrandLife using the BrandLife Figma Plugin. Effortlessly import files from your BrandLife library directly into Figma and use them in your creative projects. Once your designs are ready, export assets back into BrandLife, ensuring they are correctly organized within the right assets and collections. Simplify collaboration, maintain brand consistency, and keep your assets organized—all from within Figma.
plugins.tagline: Sync files between BrandLife and Figma
